title: Finding Nemo
short_plot_summary: After his son Nemo is captured by a diver, overprotective clownfish Marlin, along with a forgetful fish named Dory, embarks on a dangerous journey across the ocean to rescue Nemo and bring him back home.
explanation: A clownfish, representing Marlin, the main character
A fish, representing Dory, Marlin's forgetful companion
A diving mask, symbolizing the diver who captures Nemo
A turtle, symbolizing Crush, the sea turtle who helps Marlin and Dory
A tooth, representing the dentist where Nemo ends up after being captured
